website_summaries.verdict: Though these shoes offer unique features and quality support, finding the correct size could be difficult.
pros: A top running shoe from a renowned company
At a mere 7.3 oz., these shoes offer exceptional comfort, traction, and control
cons: Runs somewhat narrow and can be uncomfortable for those with wider feet

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable enough for running a few miles
customer_reviews.text: These are fine for casual use, if you plan on running over a mile a day these are a no go. The materials and construction did not meet up to my expectations for the price. The sole is pretty firm and even with gels my feet hurt after a two mile WALK. A one mile run was painful. Avoid if you are serious about working out.
customer_reviews.author: no

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes.. But I do recommend getting a half size larger.. I'm usually an 8 ( and that's what I got) and even though they aren't small.. I def need that extra half in room for my toes.. But I'm a bartender so I'm constantly on my feet and they were very comfortable and even without that extra half inch breathing room.. They were fine and definitely got the job done.. These are exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good athletic wear shoe for walking, running or everyday wear. They have a good arch support and are comfortable for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth T

customer_reviews.title: Something is seriously wrong with this model!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. I have always loved Nike sneakers but there is something really wrong with this particular model. I bought them for running but I can only use them for running errands. The tread on the bottom is uneven. The tread only runs down one side of the bottom so it turns my feet, ankles and knees inward causing pain. They caused blisters right above my achilles tendons and actual blisters between my toes. I usually only buy Nike's but this is a horrible example of the Nike brand. The only good thing I can say is that they are certainly a great looking shoe. But what is the point?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and cheap
customer_reviews.text: I needed new gym shoes and I ordered these on a whim and then panicked when I read the reviews saying they run small. I normally wear an 8 1/2 but since I had a baby I sometimes wear a 9 (I ordered the 8 1/2). However when they arrived they fit perfectly, a 9 would have been too big.
customer_reviews.author: KatieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I imagined they would be! They are a great fit (I went a half size up to compensate for feet swelling) and are very comfortable. I work with children and am constantly on the go and these stood the test for a 7 hour work day!
customer_reviews.author: Alesha

customer_reviews.title: Would Buy Again and Again
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these shoes. I normally wear a size 8 in all shoes and the 8 fit perfectly! I did not find I needed to size up at all. They are light, great support and look amazing. Exactly what I was looking for...super impressed and would definitely buy again, especially at this price!
customer_reviews.author: Tsharp

customer_reviews.title: Used item.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wife. I opened the package and they came in a generic box, the shoes didn't have any tags on, and they had small HAIRS inside. That's disgusting.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Love the blue color
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They feel a little snug, but usually with all my Nike shoes I have to break them in before I can slip into them easily. Can’t wait to start working out in them!
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Caroline Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: My third pair in 2 months. I love these so much that I bought extras in case they change/disc. them. These are so light weight and the most comfortable shoes I have worn! Fit exactly true to size. No breaking in period either. Comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Cmk

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are awesome!! I got them as a gift for my sister for college. She walks all around campus and I've never heard her complain about her feet. She wears them everywhere--even when not attending classes! The fact that she wears them all the time seems to say it all I guess. She has plenty of other shoes and sneakers but these seem to be her go-to ones for any occasion. She even found a bookbag somewhere that coordinates nicely with them. She told me she gets lots of compliments on them so I guess that makes me an awesome big sister! I'm thinking of buying a pair for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Alienware88

customer_reviews.title: So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.text: These are SO cute and comfortable. I am the office manager at a busy shop, and spend a lot of time on my feet. I needed new Nike’s and although I like the look of most of the lighter weight shoes, they never seem to provide enough support. These shoes are the perfect combo of cuteness and comfort, and I would def recommend. Buy your normal size because the fit is pretty exact. And you can’t beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: nikden

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these shoes to run. I have worn them all day at my job. I work as a florist and am very active during the day. They are very comfortable. Unlike other Nike shoes I have had, these do not pinch my toes at all. They fit as expected. I wear a 7.5 M women's shoe. I didn't get paid for this review. I actually bought the shoes. (I wish I could figure out how to get paid for reviews!) Anyway, if you're looking for an affordable, comfortable, walking shoe, I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work. I'm on my feet for 12 hours and I need comfy shoes. They are comfy and supportive. I usually wear a size 9 in sneakers but I went up 1/2 size after reading reviews. Size 9 would've been too small
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because my GF had a pair and I really liked the look. I have worn out feet from being on them most of my life, and they were comfortable for just wearing casually. When I tried to wear them for running, I had issues. I bought inserts for my plantar fasciitis, and they worked for a bit, but eventually I had to buy an expensive running shoe. I've had them over a year, and still wear them for walking casually, and for long walks with an insert. I would buy them again in a minute, but usually by the time I'm ready, they are no longer available. They are true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Frutchey

customer_reviews.title: Can we say great shoes?
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for a friend of mine who works with me. We both work 12 hour days and we are on our feet all day long. (excluding 2 breaks and a 30 min. lunch) She LOVES these shoes!!! They fit her perfectly, and she no longer had sore feet at the end of her day. I would recommend these awesome shoes to anyone, especially those who are on their feet all day. WTG, Nike! BTW, I have a pair of Nike work shoes that I love as well. Super comfy, and they are worth what you pay for them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gonce

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sneakers....
customer_reviews.text: I love the Nike Revolution 3 running shoe. And I’ll tell just you how much I love them.... I just purchased my 5th pair! These shoes are very comfortable for my feet. I’ve walked all over the USA, Europe and South America and they have held up very well. I use them during my workouts. My oldest pair is still in great shape. I bought my most recent pairs because I’m sure they are going to sell out some day. For me, Nike shoes tend to run a bit small. I wear an 8-8.5 and I always buy size 9.
customer_reviews.author: JayJay10

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes & quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable & lightweight which is great for someone that has feet problems. Working out in these feels much better than any of the shoes I've worn in the last couple of years. I'm glad I went for quality even though it was a bit expensive for me. I normally wear an 8 or 8.5 & I got the 8.5 & they fit perfectly. I'd recommend to anyone that stands a lot or works out a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Healani

customer_reviews.title: and size/fit is fine (8. 5)
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about the support and shock absorption. Had hoped to use these at the gym, but think I'll save them to wear during office walks at lunchtime. They appear to be well made, and size/fit is fine (8.5). Would have liked an 8 medium, but this is fine. Follow-up 12/11/17: Ended up giving to son's GF. Evidently, Nike has dispensed with their decades-old styles and now only seem to offer these. Support is minimal, heel cushioning vs impact isn't good. Sorry to say, but I've found a new go-to brand. What a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: and good shoes that dont blister my feet are hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: The arch support of this shoe seems strange. There's more support it seems on the outside of my foot than the arch causing me to roll in on my arches. I have narrow feet, and good shoes that dont blister my feet are hard to find; these do not blister my feet at all. And the color is so wonderful. They didnt feel like they needed to be broken in at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Ugh! These make my heel hurt!
customer_reviews.text: I walk 5 miles a day on pavement. I have worn out many pairs of Nike Flex shoes. I got the Revolution style the last time. From the first time I put them on, I had trouble with them. The curve in the back of the shoe is way too deep and cupped, and it's causing chronic pain in my left heel. I tried changing the way I lace them, adding heel inserts, etc. Nothing works. I usually get 400 miles out of a pair of Nikes. I'm getting rid of these before I hit that mile marker.
customer_reviews.author: maryz

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit, horrible shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Toe depth is very shallow, as seems to be the trend now in Nike shoes. Even though I ordered a half size bigger than usual plus a wide, still fits small. Also no inner cushioning at all! It's crazy to pay this much for a "good" brand if shoes, yet still have to add extra insoles so you can stand to wear them. After only an hour of wear, feet hurt bad. Legs feel tired. Come on Nike, you can do so much better than this! Total waste of my money with these shoes. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Edee

customer_reviews.title: Wide fit!
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find a wide width that’s actually wide enough. This shoe fit great. It was right when I initially put it on, but lessened a little to the perfect size. I don’t use the final shoestring hole or else it’s too snug, but it’s totally fine. I was nervous to buy shoes online, but the reviews said this fit wide and they were right. Great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Alyse Urquhart

customer_reviews.title: No more ankle pain!
customer_reviews.text: I work in the medical field and always relied on Nike. However I began working again with another brand name shoe and my feet, ankles and knees hurt so bad it was crazy. I went back to Nike and with one wear all that pain is gone! They were worth the money, fit perfectly and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Mason

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sneakers. I resently had Achilles' tendon surgery a year and a half ago and my back of my heal area gets tender. So this shoe was perfect for me for this reason. No digging in on the back. I went to stores and tried on so many different kinds of sneakers. This brand and style was the best. The other colors that these come in are not all the same. Just the grey/orange one fit perfectly. These are my second pair. Fits just the same.
customer_reviews.author: Warneika Pettway

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: These are my workout shoes and I love them! They have held up amazingly well and give great support. I have a high arch and a wide foot but had no problems with the fit of these AT ALL!! I never order shoes online because my foot is so hard to fit but I don't have a single complaint about these!!
customer_reviews.author: Morninglori

customer_reviews.title: Certain Death
customer_reviews.text: There are many things to love about these shoes—as long as you never, EVER walk on wet tile, linoleum, vinyl, or wood floors. They’re much worse than walking on ice covered with snow. I promise: if you walk on a smooth floor wearing these shoes, you will slip and fall and die a slow, painful death. Please. I beg you: buy something else. ANYTHING else.
customer_reviews.author: reader of books

customer_reviews.title: These Shoes Aren’t Made for Walking (or Running)
customer_reviews.text: The color is bright and the shoes look great, but they’re definitely not comfortable enough to run more than a mile in. The longer you wear them, the more the back will rub against your ankle. I’ll wear them for short spurts, but they’ve given me mini blisters more than once. Nowhere near as great as my ASICS for running.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of cushioning
customer_reviews.text: My shoes size is a 7.5 so I got a 7.5 and fitted as expected, but not much cushion for the foot. Solid bottom and heel. Good grip at the bottom of the shoes. My first pair of nikes so I hope I can break them as I keep wearing them they do feel a little stiff at first. They used rubber for the lace holes instead of metal ringlets so I hope they don’t break and I don’t think they will. Breathable holes for toes in front. Packaging was good. In a solid box and in a shoes box wrapped in paper and stuffed. Overall their cute and go with casual outfits and hope it dose me good running!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality but the orange color is nice , I was sad
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this Nike shoe why is not what I had expected . They hurt my feet , to long but not wide enough , just an odd fit to be a Nike I was very disappointed on the upside I love the color orange . I guess I'm going to have to pay 50 or above for nice pair of Nike shoes that are well-made and good quality . I was sad about this because I had been looking forward to receiving them !!! They made my foot go to sleep !!
customer_reviews.author: june overstreet

customer_reviews.title: Cute color, great consistent fit
customer_reviews.text: I love Nike for having reliable shoes that I can order online and count to fit. I have really sensitive skin that blisters from very slight friction. I am a nurse, so I spend a lot of time walking and running. These shoes get me through every shift without any blistering and didn't require any breaking in period.
customer_reviews.author: Kalina

customer_reviews.title: Yup, these are good ones!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, no rubs and feel comfortable months after breaking them in. They are light yet reliable and enduring. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bevan

customer_reviews.title: Horrible support
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice. Big problem is that it rotates my feet inward. Arches and ankles hurt a lot after wearing these shoes. I wore only 10 times before donating them. Ended up purchasing New Balance and they fit perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chastity Yazzie

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: I love these for running! with other shoes my knees and calves would take a toll, I wasn't able to run for very long or two days in a row. Although they seem to be poorly made, or they just used cheap materials. They are slowly feeling loser and loser the more I use them. I run 2mi, 3 days a week, so I use them a lot. But they are a good stater pair, I just doubt they'll lat longer. Still pretty good for the price :)
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Comfortable and stylish. I am a nurse, so comfy shoes to be on my feet for 12+ hours are a requirement. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kate S

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but too big!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe seams fine exept that they were too wide and too long. My old Nike shoes were a 10 and fit well. These definately run bigger. I am going to order a 1/2 size smaller and see what happens. Otherwise, they are nice and light and a good looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Hound Dog

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of workout shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a pair of shoes to workout in that are light weight and comfortable. I ordered a half size up and they fit perfect. It has good support and when running or doing any type of impact workout, the landing is soft. They are also cute on, especially if you have big feet like I unfortunately do.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Fits great!
customer_reviews.text: So light, but really good support. Fits perfectly and really comfortable for walking/jogging or any type of exercise. Happy to support Nike.
customer_reviews.author: M Lentz

customer_reviews.title: hard part in one shoe
customer_reviews.text: These fit fine but there is something that feels like a hard bubble in one of my shoes. I wore these around the house to make sure they would be comfortable. As soon as I started wearing them outside I noticed there was something wrong with one shoe. It's unfortunate because I have such a hard time finding a good shoe. I have ankle issues and plantar fasciitis and flat feet. Now I am out of the return window. I didn't think I could return them once I went outside anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought myself a pair of sneakers before, and this was one of the most affordable reputable shoes on Amazon prime. I have already worn them a handful of times and have 0 complaints about them. They are breathable, comfortable, and durable. 10 out of 10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Beth T

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: I received them yesterday and they were true to size. I wore them all day long (including an hour of speed-walking on the treadmill) and my feet felt great. Side note: I put my own arch inserts into the shoes. I even curled up on the couch and forgot to take them off. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. Very comfy, lightweight, and also cute. What can I say? Aesthetics matter to me. The only thing is that I generally wear a size 10 and these are just a *tad* too tight at the toes. Not enough to make me stop wearing them, though. Hence, 4 stars instead of 5. Overall, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Roo

customer_reviews.title: Shoes looked exactly like they do in the picture
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked exactly like they do in the picture. I ordered a size 9 and they fit perfectly! I always seem to have to order a half size up in Nike's so this was no different, they fit exactly how I expected. Absolutely love them! I just received them yesterday and work a 12hr shift tomorrow so hoping they feel ok while being on my feet that long, but from what I can tell so far, I think they will be just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: I returned them for a 7 1/2 and they fit fine. I wear them to do low impact aerobics ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8 and when they arrived they were too big. I returned them for a 7 1/2 and they fit fine. I wear them to do low impact aerobics (Richard Simmons Sweatin to the Oldies) and I like them. These would not be for long distance running or high impact sports. I would purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: shannon middleton

customer_reviews.title: No Arch Support
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this shoe but had to return it. There is no arch support whatsoever, causes cramps with extended normal wear.
customer_reviews.author: Columbia, MD

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than size
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes reordered precious set of shoes half size larger, they don't run true to size - love how lightweight they are!
customer_reviews.author: Ben and Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Worked for her
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 9 for my daughter and they fit perfectly. She's been having some feet problems but the seem 2 work for her. She's also a fast-growing 12 year old whose foot seems to grow constantly so it's really hard to find shoes for her that are comfortable but these did the job.
customer_reviews.author: RitaRenee

customer_reviews.title: NOT ENOUGH SUPPORT.
customer_reviews.text: Love the color of these shoes and the fit is great. There is no support, though. The footbed is flat and that's the reason for the 3 stars. Definitely need an extra sport silicone insert in order to use these for walking - can't imagine running in them.
customer_reviews.author: Fortuna Chester

customer_reviews.title: Great support, great comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, clean, crisp, beautiful white running shoes. They fit my daughter's wide feet perfectly and offer ample arch to support her flat foot. They are a simple and clean design which matches every running outfit she would desire to wear. They are great quality, comfortable, and my daughter is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Edington Top Contributor: Painting

customer_reviews.title: Defective sole tilts inward
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this model because of the ankle discomfort I felt due to the tilted sole. Besides being uncomfortable, they look tilted. Its a shame because the styling is otherwise nice but not Nike quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, comfort, comfort
customer_reviews.text: I need a wide sneaker and one with comfort and support because of some feet issues. This sneaker is everything I need! I even bought a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and very durable!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a warehouse on concrete, 10-12 hour shifts. So I had to get another pair of these before my other ones wear out. I normally have to buy a new pair of shoes every 6 months or so, but these lasted me over 2 years. Also, they are durable because I insert a custom arch support (my arches are extremely high) and the rough edges don't cut through these shoes like they would other shoes. They are comfortable. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Craig

customer_reviews.title: Gave me big blister, but works now.
customer_reviews.text: Took a few wears to wear them in, but after the first 2 times wearing them, my right heal got a huge painful blister from the back rubbing against it, with thick socks on. I now have a permanant mark on the back of my right foot. It doesnt scrape against it anymore, but wouldnt have bought them if I knew it would do that.
customer_reviews.author: TeaC

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable, true to size. I use them for general cross-training, shorter distance running. The inserts are cut somewhat sloppily & have jagged edges so could fit in the shoe a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Frances

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and performance
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great (not sure if by chance or by design) and daughter loves them. No complaints regarding fit or performance. She wears them to school and gym, and so far, they are holding up. Wouldn't be surprised if she wants another pair when the time comes!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Williams

customer_reviews.title: Suspected to be a knockoff or bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I am really disappointed with this Nike shoes. I bought this January 2019 for walking and light jogging 3 times per week and they are already falling apart. I almost landed on my face while jogging as a part of the shoe came off. Not the usual Nike quality.
customer_reviews.author: Meka

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Return due to looks like knockoff. Not sized properly. Box used & new label as ver original.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute, not heavy. For well and I got those rubber things you put across and removed the laces so the slip in and off very easy
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!! Lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these sneakers!! Very lightweight and comfy. I have problematic feet and shoes are tough for me. I was able to wear these all day my 2nd day owning them. Complete comfort. No break in necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Ordered last minute for a 5k that was less than a week away because my other shoes fell apart from being so old. I didn't get a chance to break them in and they still didn't give me any issues. Super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Way better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected. I like a shoe that makes my feet look narrow and sporty instead of round and bulky. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: loved the product. Was not a big Nike fan, but loved the fact you took a much needed stand. I will buy more items. I also bought a Nike shirt. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute but feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute, however they definitely are all look and not at all for any kind of performance. They feel cheap and not very supportive in the arch.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these, this is the second time I have bought these exact shoes just in a new color. They are my absolute favorite tennis shoes. I would say though that if you have wide feet these probably won’t be the shoe for you. I have relatively narrow feet and they fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: Libby S

customer_reviews.title: such comfortable shoes! I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Omigosh...such comfortable shoes! I am very happy with this purchase. They fit as expected and are surprisingly lightweight. I have been wearing them quite a bit and have not experienced any of my usual shoe-related back pain. They are also great looking!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a comfortable shoes for walking. I have very wide feet with two curved toes. Most of the shoes are not very comfortable but this worked well on first day . I am hoping it will break in in few weeks . I am happy 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sizes run large!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are HUGE. I always wear a 7.5 and that’s what I ordered the first round. Retuned them and got a size 7. They are about the same and still HUGE. Super disappointed and don’t think I’m up for a third try. I may also say this is my first time buying Nike shoes. It may be my last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: This is my second identical pair. I love the look and feel of of these. I just wore them every day and wore them out. Great for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend these shoes - what a deal!
customer_reviews.text: I thought these shoes were a good deal and did not expect too much, so I was pleasantly when they arrived and I found them to be immediately comfortable as soon as I put them on! I have had them almost a week and have walked several miles in them, enjoying the support and traction. I also like the colors plus the design. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: E. HUNT

customer_reviews.title: Those shoes are fake nikes. The material, construction ...
customer_reviews.text: Those shoes are fake nikes. The material,construction, everything look so cheap and poorly done. DO NOT BUY THESE shoes! I feel I have been robbed.
customer_reviews.author: Bka

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit great. My foot isn’t wide but it’s not quite as thin as a medium width. Normally Nike is too snug. These fit well and I was impressed with the room in the toes. Great support. One of the best shoes I’ve bought in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Heather N

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: I was not too impressed. It wasn't a total let down but I am not a huge fan. I have high arches and I felt like there was a lot of pressure on the outer sides of my feet. I probably would not buy them again but I don't hate them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, very comfy
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit great. They fit exactly to size and exactly how I expected them to (I'm a size 6.5, religiously in any shoe brand). I am a nurse and I use these shoes during my busy 12 hour shifts at the hospital. I love them - so comfy! The only thing I found odd, was that they didnt charge my account until 2 days after I received my shoes. Other than that, their customer service is great and I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: Since I usually wear a 6 1/2, I decided to buy 7's. My foot fits this shoe too perfectly - no room to move around. Also, I thought I was buying them for comfort and a good arch support. If Nikes run small, customers need to know how small. Does a 7 = 6 or 5 1/2? I'm disappointed but decided to keep them to wear them on short excursions. They look good!
customer_reviews.author: B. Fomby

customer_reviews.title: I’d recommend them
customer_reviews.text: They’re very cute and the color is just right. Super comfortable as well. Maybe a little bit wider than I like but only a smidge.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have done my 4.5-mile walk in these about ten times and the inner heels are now caving in. That has never happened to any of my shoes before. I would send them back, but I am guessing it's too late. Very odd experience. Wouldn't recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: ok but not great.
customer_reviews.text: a bit tight. I would have liked a wide. 10 usually fit me. Glue is visable around the top and one shoe around the top the tie hole is put on a bit crocked. but the reason I only gave it 4 stars is the are slick on the bottom when your walking on a wet surface. I don't think I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela K. Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Can't be authentic
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are cute but one of them has a higher insole than the other. It's very hard and uncomfortable. I'm not so sure these are authentic Nike shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Shica S.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: These are nice. I love my nikes. Only at first they did cause some blistering on the back of my feet. I fixed that problem by wearing higher socks and wearing bandaids. I think thats kind of to be expected when breaking in new shoes tho. They fit great now and no pain.
customer_reviews.author: serah r.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I do strength training workouts and also walk almost everywhere, and these shoes are great for both. These shoes are so comfy! I would get a half size up as everyone else recommended. For example, I normally wear size 9, but ordered a size 9.5 and they fit perfectly. So happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great casual workout sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I needed a basic sneaker to work out in and these are perfect! I sometimes go on a light jog but mainly wear them to the gym. I've had them for a few months now and they still fit/don't have any worrisome wear or tear.
customer_reviews.author: GiEt

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. I got these for my daughter who was taking a trip to Amsterdam. She walked 8 to 10 miles a day while there and they stood up and kept her feet comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needed insoles
customer_reviews.text: When I first wore them, my feet were hurting because there's not much support. I bought insoles for them and now I'm loving them. Will take these with me for my overseas trip coming up.
customer_reviews.author: yamyam

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price 😁
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how comfortable they are. So far I use them for light walks and working out at the gym. Im pleased with the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think they were bright as they are when I received them. They fit well and they're comfortable and they get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected a little snug at first just break in. If you have wider feet order wide. True to color. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mousa

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: I walked around the house in these less then 10 minutes and realized they were to small. Wasnt very comfy at all. Returned and bought some others directly from Nike.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Delivery is timely, color matched on what the photo was.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, deliver expected on time even less than thr time said. Size is good its just the width is tight on my foot. I barely ttying it on but my little fingers hurting. hate I dont want to return coz i love the color as the same as what in the photo shaw. I was thinking to gift it but there is nobody on the same size I have.
customer_reviews.author: Bernadeth M Honrubia

customer_reviews.title: NOT TOO CUSHY
customer_reviews.text: After 2nd wear, bottom of right foot started hurting. Not as shock absorbent as I originally thought. I wouldn't purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Roz L

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered half size up. Great comfortable shoes. I work as a phlebotomist 10 - 12 hour shifts and the first day wearing them my feet didn’t hurt at all!! Excellent shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McKnight

customer_reviews.title: In love with this shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have flat feet and that hurts but I went to new balance and got nice insoles so they fit very well and love the look of this shoes. Everyone says they love the look and they ask me where I got it. My friend wanted to know if a size 8 would be a lot higher in price but it was only a few dollars. Overall I love this shoe and so does everyone I know!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: It fits well and is very comfortable. I walk one hour a day
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. It fits well and is very comfortable. I walk one hour a day. It holds up pretty well. This is a different color from the previous pair, looking good.
customer_reviews.author: Clara  H. Yang

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Slips off my heel a little more than the other ones like this I've bought but otherwise a good shoe. This is my third pair.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: These are great shoes! I primarily wear Nike shoes and these ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great shoes! I primarily wear Nike shoes and these fit just like any normal Nike shoe would! They are light weight and breathable! I truly believe that they may be my favorite Nike shoes that I have purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Hope E.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit comfort n support
customer_reviews.text: These were a great find and buy at less than $50. I bought these for myself in a size 8.5 wide. They fit great and have great comfort and support. Would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jenivad1

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color & very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color. Fits as expected. Very comfortable! Don't know how supportive they are as I haven't worn them out & about yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Great fit. Comfortable first time you wear them. Seller sent them out and I received them in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Feel great
customer_reviews.text: These nike gym shoes fit nicely, true to size. These are my daily gym shoes and are comfortable even after walking in them a whole day. I like that they don't have all of these crazy colors. Just plain good looking gym shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I don’t run but I do a lot of walking. So far, these shoes have been very good for that. I bought 1/2 size larger because Nike-runs short on me.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: These run true to size, and they come in ...
customer_reviews.text: These run true to size, and they come in such a large selection of sizes that I could find my rare 11.5! So far I've worn them running and have worn them for work on days I know I'll be running around a lot, and they don't give me any pain!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: NIKE Women's Revolution 3 Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Minimal in design, Women's NIKE Revolution 3 Running Shoe is made of lightweight, single-layer mesh and minimal no-sew overlays and soft foam beneath the foot for revolutionary comfort.
